data.text: What a great little gem of a hotel. The front desk, restaurant and cleaning staff all did great jobs helping with our every need. Located conveniently to the harbour and restaurants. Lots to do near by. We will definitely stay here our next visit to Barcelona.
data.title: Barcelona visit

user_location.name: Thunder Bay, Thunder Bay District, Ontario

data.text: My wife and I stay here for 5 nights: 1 night before going to Madrid and 4 nights on return from Madrid. Nice clean room with room safe. Provided a big bottle of drinking water and an electric kettle.  Lots of table top spaces, which suits our needs as well table for cabin bags.  Very friendly staff.  The heater is not warm enough for winter times. Would better to have a box of tissue paper instead of a small packet.  Stainless steel stool enables easier scrubbing of feet but shower cubical has no door, causing  floor outside the cubical to  be wet when showing.  Ought to have door or at least floor length curtain.  Strange that after 1st day, no free bottle of water and no tissue paper.  This is against the idea of encouraging guests to stay more days.
data.title: Nice clean room with adequate table spaces but reduced benefits after 1st day

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear PerryTan;

Thank you for your words about your stay, it was a pleasure having you as a guest.
We take note about your comments in order to progress.

Regards.
owner_response.author: Raquel Cartró

data.text:
A smallish hotel, well located & with plenty of style.
Very comfortable with everthing needed & more.
Extremely helpful & accommodating staff.
A swimming pool is available, although very small.
Would certainly recommend.
data.title: Definately recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: A343YLericp; Thank you very much for your comment and your time. We are delighted that you chose our hotel for your stay in Barcelona and above all, that you had a pleasant stay. We hope to see you again! Best regards.
owner_response.author: Raquel Cartró

data.text: Our stay was outstanding! While we loved the hotel location (easy walking to restaurants/bars/cafes), the facilities and our room; it was the staff who absolutely deserve a shoutout for their amazing customer service! The front desk staff of Victor and Javier were great with answering questions, calling a cab and just being there with a willingness to pitch in and help whenever and wherever needed. Speaking of pitching in we would be remiss to not thank Marcel and Isaac for their assistance in helping us with luggage, making a drink at the bar, finding us and iron and ironing board; to just being ready to help us and other guests at any time. Food wise we have high praise for Dayana who was nothing but smiles and making sure we were well taken care of to even herself being there to play bartender when needed. My wife and I can't speak highly enough about just how friendly, professional, accommodating and helpful this hotel's staff is.  We would not hesitate to recommend it and stay there ourselves again. This was a very high end customer service experience for a very fair price. Thanks so much!
data.title: Top Notch Customer Service!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear V1469RTgaryp, Thank you for your magnificent feedback and towards choosing Catalonia Port Hotel. It is always a pleasure and honour that our services exceeded your expectation. Truly delighted to learn that you enjoyed your stay. I will share your comments with our team. I am sure that this feedback will serve as an encouragement to all of our staff as we strive to continuously improve the quality of our services. Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to have another opportunity to welcome you. See you soon!
owner_response.author: Raquel Cartró

data.text:
I stayed in this hotel for a week and I was disappointed. This hotel shouldn't have 4 stars, only one. There is no restaurant in the hotel, the swimming pool is terribly located (in the yard, in a shady place, surrounded by slum-like tenement houses) and very small with cold water. View from the window of the building in a very close distance. There are homeless people and drunks in the park next to the hotel - which is dangerous. Rooms very small, but ok. Breakfast was good, but not great. Nice service.
But I will definitely not return to this hotel. Generally, I do not recommend it to someone who likes to have a comfortable stay.
data.title: Not recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: First of all thank you for staying with us Kostkalola. We are sorry to hear that your stay did not go as well as it should have. The satisfaction of our guests is very important to us. Your suggestions are very helpful for further development and we appreciate it. Please be assured that I will review constructive criticism and that it is essential to improve our quality. Kind regards from Barcelona.
owner_response.author: Raquel Cartró
